DOC.brief_title: Effects Berries Berry Fractions Metabolic Diseases
DOC.detailed_description: The aim project investigate whether possible reduce risk metabolic diseases supplement diet sea buckthorn berry ( Hippophaë rhamnoides ) , bioactive fraction , bilberry ( Vaccinium myrtillus ) . The study design randomize cross-over clinical trial . The participant slightly moderately overweight female subject . In total , 110 female volunteer recruit , follow four different berry diet ( bilberry , sea buckthorn , sea buckthorn phenolic extract sea buckthorn oil ) randomize order 33-35 day . Each intervention follow wash-out period 30-39 day . Blood sample draw physical measurement perform period . Eighty volunteer complete study . Different marker lipid carbohydrate metabolism inflammation measure form blood sample .
DOC.criteria: BMI 2634 total cholesterol 4.58 mmol/l LDL chol > 2.5 mmol/l triglyceride < 4 mmol/l glucose < 6 mmol/l insulin < 25 mU/l blood pressure < 160/99 mm Hg hemoglobin > 120 g/l thyroidstimulating hormone 0.34.2 mU/l ALAT < 60 U/l creatinine < 115 umol/l pregnancy menopause , regular smoking previously diagnose diabetes ( gestational ) thyroid , renal , hematological , hepatic dysfunction previous myocardial infarction cardiovascular medication treatment regular medication allergy medication joint lubricate ongoing inflammatory disease
